QuestData.Title: Zombie Juice
QuestData.Description: I need a bottle of a certain liquor - Zombie Juice. Tavernkeep Smitts at the Scarlet Raven Tavern in Darkshire should have some.$B$BAnd please hurry, $n. These nights get cold, and I need that drink to put fire in my veins again!
QuestData.RewardText: You need some Zombie Juice, do you? Hmm...that's some strong stuff - I don't usually get requests for it.
